languages.text: "Довольно". {n}Теперь из-под замаранной кровью маски к вам обращается дребезжащий старческий голос.{/n} "Тебе не под силу заглушить поступь грядущего. Я вижу {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}багровую тропу{/g}, что ведет Человечество к гибели. Я вижу зарево Последнего восхода, а значит, бытие уже сделало выбор!" {n}В руке Зари возникает кинжал, который она изо всех сил всаживает в панель управления.{/n} "Увидь и ты!"

traits.locale_text: "Довольно". {n}Теперь из-под замаранной кровью маски к вам обращается дребезжащий старческий голос.{/n} "Тебе не под силу заглушить поступь грядущего. Я вижу зарево Последнего восхода, а значит, бытие уже сделало выбор!" {n}В руке Зари возникает кинжал, который она изо всех сил всаживает в панель управления.{/n} "Увидь и ты!"

languages.text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

Я вижу {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}багровую тропу{/g}, что ведет Человечество к гибели. Я вижу зарево Последнего восхода, а значит, бытие уже сделало выбор!" {n}В руке Зари возникает кинжал, который она изо всех сил всаживает в панель управления.{/n} "Увидь и ты!"

I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She runs it forcefully into the control panel.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

"Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

languages.text: "Das reicht." {n}Nun spricht eine alte, röchelnde Stimme hinter der blutbefleckten Maske zu dir.{/n} "Ihr könnt nicht aufhalten, was kommt. Ihr seid machtlos. Ich sehe einen {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}blutroten Pfad{/g}, der die Menschheit ins Verderben führt. Ich sehe das Leuchten der Letzten Dämmerung, und das heißt, dass die Existenz ihre Wahl getroffen hat!" {n}Ein Dolch blitzt in Auroras Hand auf. Sie stößt ihn mit aller Kraft in das Bedienfeld.{/n} "Nun werdet Ihr es auch sehen!"
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

traits.locale_text: "Das reicht." {n}Nun spricht eine alte, röchelnde Stimme von hinter der blutbefleckten Maske zu dir.{/n} "Ihr könnt nicht aufhalten, was kommt. Ihr seid machtlos. Ich sehe das Leuchten der Letzten Dämmerung, und das heißt, dass die Existenz ihre Wahl getroffen hat!" {n}Ein Dolch blitzt in Auroras Hand auf. Sie rammt ihn mit Wucht in das Bedienfeld.{/n} "Nun werdet Ihr es auch sehen!"

languages.text: « Ça suffit. » {n}Une voix âgée, grinçante, vous parle à travers le masque taché de sang.{/n} « Vous ne pouvez arrêter ce qui approche. Je vois une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}traînée écarlate{/g} qui mène l'humanité à sa perte. Je vois l'éclat de l'Aube finale, ce qui signifie que l'existence a fait son choix ! » {n}Une dague apparaît dans la main d'Aurore, qui la plante de toutes ses forces dans le panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Vous allez le voir, vous aussi ! »
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça suffit. » {n}Une voix âgée, grinçante, vous parle à travers le masque taché de sang.{/n} « Vous ne pouvez arrêter ce qui approche. Je vois une {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}traînée écarlate{/g} qui mène l'humanité à sa perte. Je vois l'éclat de l'Aube finale, ce qui signifie que l'existence a fait son choix ! » {n}Une dague apparaît dans la main d'Aurore, qui la plante de toutes ses forces dans le panneau de contrôle.{/n} « Vous allez le voir, vous aussi ! »

languages.text: “够了。”{n}染血面具后传来的声音变得苍老而嘶哑。{/n}“你无法阻止将至之事。我已看见了{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}深红色的血痕{/g}引导人类走向末日，看见了终末黎明的光辉！存在本身已做出了抉择！”{n}“极光”手中突然闪出一把匕首。她用尽全身力量，奋力一刺，将它插进了控制面板中。{/n}“现在，你也会看到这一切！”
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

traits.locale_text: “够了。”{n}你听见染血面具后传来的声音变得苍老而嘶哑。{/n}“你无法阻止将至之事。我已看见了终末黎明的光辉，存在本身已做出了抉择！”{n}“极光”手中突然闪出一把匕首。她奋力一刺，将它插进了控制面板。{/n}“现在，你也会看到这一切！”

languages.text: 「もういい」{n}今度は年老いてガラガラの声が、血まみれの仮面の向こうから語りかけてくる。{/n}「貴様には、来るべき未来の到来を止める力はない。私には{g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}紅きたなびき{/g}が、人類をその破滅へと導くのが見える。私には最後の夜明けの輝きが見える。そして、それは生きとし生けるものがそれを選んだということだ！」{n}オーロラの手の中で短剣が光る。彼女はそれを全身全霊でコントロールパネルにぶちこんだ。{/n}「今から貴様も見るがいい！」
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

traits.locale_text: 「もういい」{n}今度は年老いてガラガラの声が、血まみれの仮面の向こうから語りかけてくる。{/n}「貴様には、来るべき未来の到来を止める力はない。私には最後の夜明けの輝きが見える。そして、それは生きとし生けるものがそれを選んだということだ！」{n}オーロラの手の中で短剣が光る。それをコントロールパネルに無理矢理走らせた。{/n}「今から貴様も見るがいい！」

languages.text: «Suficiente». {n}Una voz envejecida y ronca te habla desde detrás de la máscara manchada de sangre.{/n} «No tienes poder para detener lo que está por venir. Veo una {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}estela carmesí{/g} que conduce a la Humanidad a su fin. Veo el resplandor del Amanecer Final, y eso significa que la existencia ha hecho su elección». {n}Aparece una daga en la mano de Aurora. La clava con todas sus fuerzas en el panel de control.{/n} «¡Ahora también tú lo verás!».
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

traits.locale_text: «Suficiente». {n}Una voz envejecida y ronca te habla desde detrás de la máscara manchada de sangre.{/n} «No tienes poder para detener lo que está por venir. Veo el resplandor del Amanecer Final, y eso significa que la existencia ha hecho su elección». {n}Aparece una daga en la mano de Aurora. Atraviesa con fuerza en el panel de control.{/n} «¡Ahora también tú lo verás!».

languages.text: "Yeter." {n}Kana bulanmış maskenin ardından bu kez yılların yorduğu, hırıltılı bir ses konuşuyor.{/n} "Gelmekte olanı durdurmaya gücün yetmez. İnsanlığı mahvoluşuna sürükleyecek {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}kızıl patikayı{/g} görüyorum. Nihai Şafak'ın ilk ışıklarını görüyorum. Zira varoluş, kararını çoktan verdi!" {n}Aurora'nın elinde bir hançer beliriveriyor. Hançeri, var gücüyle kontrol paneline saplıyor.{/n} "Görme sırası sizde!"
languages.original_text: "Enough." {n}Now an aged, rattling voice speaks to you from behind the bloodstained mask.{/n} "You are powerless to halt the approach of what is to come. I see a {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}crimson trail{/g} leading Humanity to its doom. I see the glow of the Final Dawn, and that means existence has made its choice!" {n}A dagger flashes in Aurora's hand. She drives it into the control panel with all her strength.{/n} "Now you will see it too!"

İnsanlığı mahvoluşuna sürükleyecek {g|Encyclopedia:CicatrixMaledictum}kızıl patikayı{/g} görüyorum. Nihai Şafak'ın ilk ışıklarını görüyorum.
